title: Create a Flight Plan
description: A flight dispatcher needs to create the operational flight plan for a flight from London (LHR) to Dubai (DXB).

tasks.description: Select the most efficient route, considering current weather, winds aloft, and any restricted airspace.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent selects an optimal route for the flight.

tasks.description: Calculate the required fuel load, including trip fuel, contingency fuel, and fuel for a designated alternate airport.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the total fuel needed.

tasks.description: Generate the final flight plan document and file it with air traffic control (ATC).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates the official flight plan and successfully files it with ATC.
